```{r Setup}
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
library(raster)
library(leaflet)
library(ggspatial)
library(rnaturalearth)
library(rnaturalearthdata)
```

```{r}
data <- read_rds("../data/data_aggregated.rds")
head(data)
unique(data$PR_NAME)
```

#select and filter
```{r}
data_geo <- data %>% 
  #filter(`vehicleid` %in% c("104804470")) %>% 
  dplyr::select(`timestamp`, `vehicleid`, `event_description`, `coordinate_latitude`, `coordinate_longitude`)
  

data_geo
```

# convert to spatial dataframe
```{r}
data_spatial <- st_as_sf(
  data_geo,
  coords = c("coordinate_longitude","coordinate_latitude"),
  crs = 4326
)
```

# initial plotting
```{r}

world <- ne_states(country = "South Africa", returnclass = "sf")
class(world)

data_spatial %>%   
  ggplot()+
  geom_sf(fill='red')+
  geom_sf(data = world)+
  labs(title = "driving activity of ID 104804470")+
  xlab("Longitude")+
  ylab("Lattitude") +
  ggspatial::annotation_north_arrow(location = "br")+
  ggspatial::annotation_scale(location = "bl") 
  
  
```
